metadata.title: PEARL IZUMI W Select Escape Thermal Jrsy
features: SELECT thermal fleece sets the benchmark in warmth and moisture transfer
Full length zipper for venting with draft flap
BioViz high visibility colors and reflective elements
description: Perfect for cool weather coffee shop rides, select thermal fleece moves moisture away from skin, while a satiny full front zipper provides smooth venting. Slimming directional reflective side stripes add visibility.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "1 x 1 x 1 inches; 1 Pounds", "Department": "womens", "Date First Available": "November 17, 2009", "Manufacturer": "Pearl iZUMi Ride"}
